title: Missed attestation with no errors / incorrectly voted?
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description It sometimes happens with my setup, that I miss attestations altough no error appears in the log. My validator 1540 missed slot 4278900 for no obious reason. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? I observed this also prior to v.2.1.3 ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Not reproducable? ## üî• Error No Error. You can see, that attestation for slot 4278900 is submitted. But in the next epoch, it is said that the submission was not correct or that the validator did not vote correctly. How can this happen? **Validator log** 
  
[2022-07-18 20:56:11]  INFO validator: No duty until next epoch slotInEpoch=31
